Title: The Stray
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created for television by), Lisa Joy (created for television by), Daniel T. Thomsen, Lisa Joy, Charles Yu (story editor), Halley Wegryn Gross (story editor), Michael Crichton (based on the film written by)
Actors: Evan Rachel Wood, Thandie Newton, Jeffrey Wright, James Marsden
Plot: Elsie and Stubbs search for a missing host; Teddy gets a new backstory; Bernard investigates the origins of madness and hallucinations within the hosts.
